name: ProcSoccer
description:
Controls and Basic Rules
  • Use WASD to move
  • LMB to shoot
  • Hold LMB to charge your shot and make it more powerful \ @O@ /

Use your Shooting and flying abilities to score goals. Scoring within a short interval will get you multipliers for your score and adds 5 seconds to your timer! This is cuz the theme is renewal :D

But be aware! Those grey spheres are bombs! So if you come close they will explode and damage you. If you shoot one of those into the goal, your multiplier will reset.

In the middle you will see a timer running out. Once every time (indicated by the timer turning blue) the game rules will change.
At the moment there are the following rules:

  • Faster Game speed
  • Slower Game Speed
  • Blindness
  • Reversed Controls
  • One Button Mode (yep, just W and LMB :D)
  • Suiciding Bombs, meaning only bombs will spawn :O
